# lwn2md

CLI tool converting Lwn.net articles to markdown.

## Installation

```bash
pip install lwn2md

or

pipx install lwn2md
```

## Usage

```bash
lwn2md https://lwn.net/Articles/953738/

or

lwn2md https://lwn.net/Articles/953738/ MyArticle.md
```

Output name is optional, default is `{title}.md`
